title: I Wish I Could Tell You A Story
content:
I wish I could tell you a story.
A tale of two friends, so merry.

title: Train of thought
content:
I would love to see a train with you,
Feel the sounds, the vibration, and the groove.

title: Fates
content:
My heart whispers warnings,
But I turn a deaf ear.

title: i'm in love with you that night
content:
It was probably night
It was started with a smile

title: The pain you caused me
content:
I told myself
You'd get yourself hurt

title: That's it
content:
That's it.
Perhaps we weren't a fit after all,

title: For nothing. Always.
content:
All this feelings for nothing
All this feelings,

title: You just didn't love me
content:
I'm ignorant
To the fact that

title: His eyes
content:
His eyes would be dark
Too dark to realize it just it is

title: Everything is awesome isn't it?
content:
Sometimes i remember how interesting he was
I always thought that I'm not enough
